Explain the similarities and differences between the European System of Central Banks and the Federal Reserve System.
answer_text: The similarities between the two are in th eir structure. The National Central Banks of the member countries of the Eurosystem have the sam e role as the Federal Reserve Banks in the Federal Reserve System. The Executive Board and the Governing Council of the Eurosystem resemble the Board of Governors and the Federal Ope n Market Committee of the Federal Reserve System, respectively.
